ISG.MI.summary: Isagro S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, manufacturing, marketing, and distribution of agro pharmaceuticals products for crop protection and nutrition in Europe, Asia, North America, and South America. Its products include fungicides, insecticides, microorganisms, biostimulants, pheromones, and fumigants. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy. Isagro S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Holdisa S.r.l.

ISGS.MI.summary: Isagro S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, manufacturing, marketing, and distribution of agro pharmaceuticals products for crop protection and nutrition in Europe, Asia, North America, and South America. Its products include fungicides, insecticides, microorganisms, biostimulants, pheromones, and fumigants. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy. Isagro S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Holdisa S.r.l.

SICT.MI.summary: SICIT Group S.p.A. manufactures and sells amino acid and peptide-based fertilizers for agriculture and plaster industries in Italy. The company provides biostimulants in liquid and powder form; and retarders for plaster and plasterboard under the PlastRetard brand. It operates in the agrochemical and industrial sectors. The company also exports its products to approximately 90 countries. SICIT Group S.p.A. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Chiampo, Italy.
